                                                                      java.lang.Integer quantity)
                                                               throws ItemNotPresentException
        Get an item from Itemizer.
        Parameters:
        itemId - id of the Itemizer item.
        quantity - quantity of this item.
        Returns:
        Return an itemStack with the represented item.
        Throws:
        ItemNotPresentException - throw exception when the id does not exit

      • hasItem

        public boolean hasItem(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player,
                       java.lang.String id,
                       java.lang.Integer quantity)
                throws ItemNotPresentException
        Check if a player have an Itemizer item.
        Parameters:
        player - the target of your check.
        id - the id of the item.
        quantity - the amount.
        Returns:
        Return true if the targeted player have the item in enough quantity and false if he * haven't
        Throws:
        ItemNotPresentException - if the id does not exist
